text: Shehyan Tahseen (Kurdish: شه‌هیان ته‌حسین), also transliterated as Şehyan Tehsîn, (born 30 June 1988), is a Kurdishanchor, television presenter, and reporter. She was born in the city of Duhok (Kurdish: دهوك) in Iraqi Kurdistan. She started early at the age of 11 as a TV presenter for children shows and programs in Kurdistan TV (first Kurdish satellite channel in Kurdistan. During her studies at the University of Duhok, she hosted a raising social awareness program Tik Tak Show on Kurdistan TV, which was about youth, community, and their interests. ==Career== ===Television=== Shahyan was one of the presenters of the famous show Beyani Bash Kurdistan (English: Good Morning Kurdistan) (Kurdish: به‌یانی باش كوردستان) for 6 years on Kurdistan TV. She also had her own program, Tik Tak Show, a raising social awareness program in Kurdistan TV about youth, community, and their interests in Kurdish society. After she graduated from the College of Engineering, Civil Department at the University of Duhok in 2011, and working 2 years in engineering, she started hosting a television show, The Restart Show, about city development n the WAAR TV channel. The show dealt with engineering planning and environmental issues. Besides, she worked as a news anchor on the same media channel. In May 2015, Shahyan started working in Rudaw Media Network as a TV/Radio News Anchor and presenter of the Nuroj morning show, followed by many other successful programs. During the Ramadhan month of 2017, Her TV Show named ""Taxi Ramazan"" scored a hit in the Kurdish channels for the highest number of views due to the hot topics it included and direct interaction with the people's life and problems in finding solutions for them. Currently, Shahyan is a news anchor in Rudaw Media Network and hosts ""Berpirsyar"" TV show, as the extension of ""Taxi Ramazan"" in a new format, but the same content approach. === Awards and Recognitions === Shahyan has earned several local and international awards and recognitions for her achievements. On November 2019, Shahyan was granted the title of a highly commended rising star by global media network FIPP world congress in Las Vegas, USA. The award from FIPP, which has more than 500 member companies in over 60 countries, recognises "outstanding work in the global media industry." Submissions for the award came from Africa, Asia, Europe and America. Shahyan presents Barpirsiyar, a show that examines the everyday challenges of life in the Kurdistan Region. ===Events=== Shahyan also covers most of the important events held in Duhok, such as Duhok International Film Festival as the event manager and stage moderating dozens of international events, celebrations, and conferences held in the Kurdish region. In addition, she has represented the Kurdish Media in many International events. Shahyan covered Kurdish film programs in international film festival such as the Nashville Film Festival in 2013 in the United States which was organized by Duhok IFF, Nashville Film Festival with the Academy Partnership for Kurdish Film Celebration ==Television appearances== *Beyani Bash Kurdistan" - Kurdistan TV *Tik Tak Show - Kurdistan TV *The Restart Show - WAAR TV HD *NewRoj - Rudaw Media Network *Taxi Remezan - Rudaw Media Network *Berpirsyar - Rudaw Media Network == References == ==External links== * Category:Kurdish writers Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Iraqi Kurdish people
